items.text: Randall Cates is a stable owner near Edmond, OK.
[[CITE|3|http://yelp.com/biz/randall-cates-stables-edmond]], offering horse riding lessons for aspiring equine riders across the Oklahoma region.
[[CITE|2|https://crunchbase.com/organization/randall-cates-stables-inc]]He is married to his wife, Elizabeth, who he met in his early adult life.
